data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 18,234 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Osmanabad, Maharashtra, India

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Osmanabad, Maharashtra, India. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.section_summary: On average, 134 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Osmanabad, Maharashtra, India.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.
Spirit, disrupt complacency in the 18,234 believers living in the county of Osmanabad. Remind them you are coming soon.
data.verse: Therefore, stay awake, for you do not know on what day your Lord is coming.

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Osmanabad, Maharashtra, India and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Kalavant people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Father, answer the requests of your people in the county of Osmanabad.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.

data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Osmanabad.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the county of Osmanabad.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.
